channel.title: Prerequiste on Crunchy Data PostgreSQL Operator Playbooks
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequiste on Crunchy Data PostgreSQL Operator Playbooks

item.title: Prerequisites
item.description: Prerequisites The following is required prior to installing PostgreSQL Operator using Ansible: Ansible 2.4.6+ Kubernetes v1.11+ or OpenShift v3.09+ kubectl or oc configured to communicate with Kubernetes postgres-operator-playbooks source code checked out for the target version Configuring the Inventory File The inventory file included with the PostgreSQL Operator Playbooks allows installers to configure how the operator will function when deployed into Kubernetes. This file should contain all configurable variables the playbooks offer.
